summary:
**Meeting Overview**: The Dallas Board of Adjustment (Panel C) will convene on December 11, 2023, with a briefing at 10:30 A.M. followed by a public hearing at 1:00 P.M. The meeting will take place at Dallas City Hall and via videoconference. The purpose is to address various zoning and adjustment requests from residents and to approve the annual report.

**Key Agenda Items**: The meeting will include a staff presentation, public hearing, and public testimony. Key items on the agenda involve the approval of the 2022-2023 Board of Adjustment Annual Report and the minutes from the previous meeting on November 13, 2023.

**Important Details**: The agenda features several uncontested cases where applicants are seeking variances related to off-street parking and front-yard setbacks. Notable cases include requests from Pedro Montoya for a variance at 2518 N. Garrett Avenue, and Juan Lopez for a variance at 3919 Furey Street. There are also individual cases involving appeals regarding the denial of work certificates at 5711 Mercedes Avenue and 915 Monte Vista Drive.

**Action Items**: The Board is seeking approval for the annual report and meeting minutes, as well as decisions on various variance requests and appeals. Participants wishing to speak must register by December 10, 2023, to ensure their voices are heard during the public hearing.
